name: VoiceofReasonbySamuelCherinet
0:
”Alexa ask voice of reason why I am feeling so lost”
”Alexa open voice of reason”
”Alexa play voice of reason”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: voice of reason
des: This skill will respond to questions that is start with "why", and tries to provide you some reason that is just so random that it might just lighten up your day.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
